title: Insearch of viewable objects
creator_credit: Jane Nicholls and Swinburne Institute of Technology. Film and Television School
brief_description: Traces the life of the voyeur, showing the pleasure, pain and confusion. This is a student film which explores the main character’s voyeuristic experiences from boyhood to manhood who, eventually has the cameras turned on him at the end of the film - the “watcher” has now become the “watched”! Cinematography by John Tweg.
